lead_paragraph: ISAACSON--Leonard A. The partners and staff of Joel Isaacson & Co. are deeply saddened by the passing of Lenny, our founder's dad. We were lucky to have known him and experienced his charm and wit. Our heartfelt condolences and sympathy to his children Deborah, Joel, Larry, their spouses and his beautiful grandchildren. He will be sorely missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ISAACSON, LEONARD A
